post.description: Import clients from external app. Once the import process is complete, we will request a page number minus one (-1 page)

send_notifications_when_done.description: Sends an email to staff when the import is done. Defaults to true. Set to false to skip.

upload_type.description: Is it single (individual contacts) or multi (multiple clients under the same contact)

fields.description: A list of fields to be updated

value.description: The fields value to be updated

note.description: A note to add to the matter created

tags.description: Tags to add to the matter created

get.description: Gets Matters by filter. Searchable fields are: Email, First name, Last name, Matter name and Phone.
Gets the collaborators of a Matter
get.summary: Gets the collaborators of a Matter

post.description: Adds a collaborator to a Matter
post.summary: Adds a collaborator to a Matter

delete.description: Removes a collaborator from a Matter
delete.summary: Removes a collaborator from a Matter

put.description: Nest a matter under another contact person
put.summary: Nest a matter under another contact person

parameters.description: How many items to return per page. Default: 25. Max: 100
parameters.name: per_page

notes.description: Notes for the message to staff

delete.description: Remove a tag from a Matter
delete.summary: Remove a tag from a Matter

get.description: Gets a list of tags of a Matter

post.description: Adds a tag to a Matter

value.description: The fields value to be updated

get.description: Get the client settings for a specific client - Available for Staff and Client Tokens

put.description: Update the client settings for a specific client - Available for Staff and Client Tokens

scopes.business/clients: All clients related operations from the business side
